84737.affected_area: Coquitlam (River Springs, Town Centre, & Westwood Plateau)
84737.summary: Some customers in the River Springs, Town Centre, & Westwood Plateau areas of Coquitlam are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
84737.title: Nov 18 - Coquitlam (River Springs, Town Centre, & Westwood Plateau) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

84738.title: Nov 18 - Medicine Hat  (North Flats & North Flats) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
